title: Eddie Jones enlists Japanese scrum-half Genki Okoshi to imitate Faf de Klerk...complete with blonde wig
text:
Even before replacement scrum half Ben Spencer arrived in Japan, England had a 32nd member of their World Cup squad in the form of Japanese scrum-half Genki Okoshi.

With head coach Eddie Jones relying upon his connections with Top League club Suntory Sungoliath to call upon extra players for training sessions, Okoshi has been a frequent plus one in the England camp.

Suntory and former Australia fly-half Matt Giteau has also been invited by Jones but was carrying an injury. According to Giteau, Okoshi has become a hit among the England players and this week has performed the role of diminutive South African scrum-half...
description: Even before replacement scrum half Ben Spencer arrived in Japan, England had a 32nd member of their World Cup squad in the form of Japanese scrum-half Genki Okoshi.
